titles.title: Congratulating the Saint John's University men's basketball team for winning the 2003 National Invitation Tournament basketball championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 4/10/2003--Introduced. Congratulates the Saint John's University men's basketball team for winning the 2003 National Invitation Tournament Division I men's basketball championship.
